text: Enrique Barόn Crespo (born 27 March 1944 in Madrid) is a Spanish politician, economist, and lawyer. He is a member of the Spanish Socialist Workers' Party and was a member of the European Parliament for the Party of European Socialists group until 2009. After election to the European Parliament he was President of the European Parliament (1989-1992), and was PES Group chairman from 1999 to 2004. He was Chairman of the Committee on Foreign Affairs (1992-1995). ==Other websites== *European Parliament: Your MEPs *European Parliament Office in Spain Category:1944 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of the European Parliament Category:MEPs for Spain Category:Politicians from Madrid
title: Enrique Barón Crespo
